item.title: Blue Prince: Treasure Trove Secret Walkthrough
item.description:
There are more than 100 different rooms in Blue Prince . If you want to learn the whole story and finish the game, you will need to study everything inside of each of these rooms, and solve a variety of puzzles. One of the many rooms you can draft is called the Treasure Trove.

The Treasure Trove is filled with mysteries. If you want to learn more about the lore of Blue Prince and get the true ending, you will need to uncover everything this floorplan has to offer. This Guide is here to help you do just that, and will walk you through every secret found in the Treasure Trove room in Blue Prince.

How to Get the Treasure Trove in Blue Prince

The Treasure Trove is not a room you start the game with. In order to unlock this floorplan in Blue Prince , you will need to find it. If you have reached the Underground area, you may have encountered a locked red door. It is located in the long hallway to the Sanctum; there is a hidden hallway to the left near the gate. Turn down this hallway, and you'll find the door there.

In order to unlock the red door in the underpass in Blue Prince , you will need to draft the Boiler Room inside your home. This power source allows you to send electricity to other rooms in your home through the vents in the ceiling. But it also contains the secret to opening the red door.

There is a red box on one side of the bottom floor of the Boiler Room that doesn't seem to do anything when you send power to it. However, if you route power to that red box and then head into the underpass, you will then be able to get inside the red door. There will be a locked cage; this is considered a safe in Blue Prince , so you need to figure out a date to put into it for the combination. The only month and day combination that fits is May 8th . Open the gate, head inside, and pick up the Treasure Trove, read the red envelope, and pick up the gem.

Treasure Trove Secrets in the Trunks in Blue Prince

Every time you draft the Treasure Trove inside your home, you will notice a variety of chests between the two doors. They will be either white, blue, pink, or black, with a sun symbol, a fire symbol, or a moon on top. Each is locked and must be unlocked with a key. So what is inside each of these chests? In short, pieces of paper.

Depending on which combination of colors you come across, you will find different messages in each, which give a clue as to which colors and combinations are true or false. There are a lot of these, so you might not want to look for all of them yourself. Here they all are, if you aren't interested in figuring it out for yourself:

Box Color

Symbol

Note Color

Text Type

Text

Typed

The green memos you find in this room will always be true.

One of these true statements is a green, typed note in a black sun box. It reads "The true treasure of the Trove is in this room but is not in the house." This is the true statement that will help you solve the second mystery of the Treasure Trove.

The True Treasure of the Trove in Blue Prince

The clue is "The true treasure of the Trove is in the room, but cannot be found in the house." Therefore, you need to use the Blue Prince Shrine blessing called the Blessing of the Monk. You can achieve this by getting the Shrine and giving it 13, 29, 45, 61 or 77 coins . The number of days you get to keep the power is raised by one for each amount listed; for example, 13 gold will give you three days of the blessing while 29 will give 4 days.

The power allows you to draft whatever room you ended the day in, but outside . Therefore, this is how you put the Treasure Trove outside the house. Once it is there, you will find a different kind of trunk in the Trove, but it can't be opened with any keys or items from inside the house. Instead, you will need the Key of Aries.

How to Find the Key of Aries in Blue Prince

The Key of Aries is one of the most challenging and convoluted puzzles in Blue Prince . If you want to solve it, you need to follow all the steps below to get your hands on this unique key. First, you need to solve the Chess puzzle, then solve the Castle puzzle, then the Mora Jai puzzles inside the Unknown room, figure out the riddle, and then solve the CASTLE cipher.

The Chess Puzzle Solution

To find this elusive key, you will need to either have completed the Blue Flame puzzle in Blue Prince to be able to use the elevator to the underground, or you need to have gotten through the underground until you find the Chess puzzle. To solve this puzzle, you will need to get certain combinations of rooms together in the house. Many of the rooms in the house have chess pieces standing inside them. These large decorations correspond to the chess puzzle pieces, and you need to have one of each of these kinds of rooms to finish it. Here are each of the rooms that has each of the different kinds of chess pieces inside:

Chess Piece

Rooms

Picture

Pawn

Bedroom

Bunk Room

Den

Dining Room

Dormitory

Drawing Room

Freezer

Guest Bedroom

Lost and Found

Parlor

Secret Passage

Solarium

Storeroom

Walk-In Closet

Knight

Armory

Observatory

Security Room

Treasure Trove

Rook

Clock Tower

Conservatory

Nook

Vault

Bishop

Attic

Bookshop

Chapel

Rumpus Room

King

Office

Throne Room

Queen

Her Ladyshipâ€™s Chambers

Study

As soon as one of each of the rooms above is in your house, return to the Underground to place each of the pieces in the place on the 5x9 board that corresponds to the location of that room in the house. Here is an example of what that could look like:

How to Solve the Castling Puzzle

Once you have solved the Chess puzzle, you will get the option to choose from several different powers, one for each of the Chess pieces from the puzzle. Each of these gives you some interesting buffs while drafting in your home.

Piece

Power Name

Power Description

Pawn

Ambition of the Pawn

When you reach rank 8 each day, you may choose Knight, Bishop, Rook, or Queen powers. You gain the power of that piece until the end of the day.

Knight

Mantle of the Knight

Adds the Armory room to your draft pool.

Queen

Gambit of the Queen

Each time you draft a room in the Queenside of the house, you lose five steps and gain a key.

King

Banner of the King

Each day, you may choose a room color via your inventory/menu. Rooms of the chosen color are more likely to be drawn while drafting.

Bishop

Piety of the Bishop

You do not have to pay tithes. Instead, you gain +30 gold the first time you enter the Chapel each day.

Rook

Resilience of the Rook

You may draw floor plans up to four times when drafting the four corner rooms of the house.

However, you may have noticed a breakable wall on the right side of the Chess puzzle room. If you break it with the crafted Blue Prince item called the Powerhammer, you will find a cipher behind the wall. It simply reads CASTLE . What does this mean in terms of chess and the chess puzzle, you might be wondering? Well, it's a hint of what to do next.

If you choose the Rook power, then solve the Chess puzzle again and choose the King's power (or vice versa), you will be completing a move called Castling. In chess, this move allows you to move both the King and the Rook at the same time. This will open up a wall inside the Chess puzzle room .

How to Solve the Mora Jai Puzzle Boxes in the Unknown in Blue Prince

At this point in the game, you have probably already solved many of these Mora Jai puzzle boxes. There are eight Mora Jai puzzles in the room you find yourself in, and they have green, yellow, purple, pink, black, orange, and gray tiles. Just in case you need a refresher, here are the rules for each of these colors:
  • Green : Swaps positions with its mirrored tile.
  • Yellow : Moves up one.
  • Purple : Moves down one.
  • Pink : Rotates all surrounding tiles one place clockwise.
  • Black : Shifts all tiles in that row one to the right.
  • Orange : Changes color to match the color that has the most tiles around it.
  • Gray : Nothing.

If you are still having trouble, here are all the solutions to each of the eight Mora Jai puzzle boxes in this room:

Mora Jai Box 1 Answer

Mora Jai Box 2 Answer

Mora Jai Box 3 Answer

Mora Jai Box 4 Answer

Mora Jai Box 5 Answer

Mora Jai Box 6 Answer

Mora Jai Box 7 Answer

Mora Jai Box 8 Answer

Inside each Mora Jai box are papers with part of a poem on them. Solve this riddle to ensure you have the information you need to get the next part right.

The Mora Jai Riddle in the Unknown Room in Blue Prince

If you put all the pages together in order, it reads:

Will a youth approach with empty arms,

without gifts nor gold nor mannered charms,

on the Sacred Hour, that timeworn phrase

in Aries Court where the King now lays.

A sullen cross as five stars align,

and in the sky above, a brilliant sign,

a patient figure a reckoning great,

the black key is lying with the last king of eight.

  • You need to enter with no items in your inventory, no gold, no Blue Prince gems, no Ivory Dice, nothing.
  • Draft an Observatory inside the house, and make sure that the Southern Cross is one of your Constellations for the day.
  • Head into the Unknown room and stand in there until it is 1:30 PM.
  • This will cause the tomb to rise out of the floor.

The CASTLE Cipher Solution

Last but not least, you have to solve the Cipher to complete the final puzzle and get the Key of Aries. The tomb inside the Unknown room has a clock face on it, and there is a puzzle that will teach you how to move the hands in order to solve it. In the room with the Chess puzzle, behind the broken wall, is the word CASTLE, but it looks like this:

  • C _ _
  • A _ _
  • S _ _
  • T _ _
  • L _ _
  • E _ _

You will need to use clues you find around the house to fill in all the blank spaces. Six total hints are located in different locations and rooms around the estate. These are:

  • The Locker Room
  • The Kennel
  • The Cloister
  • The Vault
  • The Secret Passage
  • The Blackbridge Grotto

If you combine all the letters, you can compile six-word phrase, and each word has three letters: CIX ADD TOR LOR ETT . You can find hints about what these words mean in the Classrooms.

  • CIX : The first word in this puzzle is a Roman numeral. It translates to 109.
  • ADD SIX : Add six to 109, and you get 115.
  • TOR : Ejaran word for "rotate something counterclockwise."
  • LOR : Ejaran word for "word."
  • ETT : Ejaran word for "East."

With this, you now have all the steps you need to complete the Clock puzzle.

  • The clock starts at 1:30.
  • Move the hands with the rewind button to read 1:09 . Press the orange button.
  • Wind the clock to 1:15 . Press the button again.
  • Rewind the clock counterclockwise until the minute hand is pointed at the word East , which is right next to the V on the clock. The time will read 12:26 . Press the button.

The Key of Aries will appear inside the tomb. From this point forward, the tomb will be up each time you enter this room, but you will need to re-solve the Cipher puzzle with the same answers every time you want to grab the key again. Take the key to the locked box in the outdoor Treasure Trove to open it up and see what's hidden inside.

10 Images
10 Images

item.title: Pokemon TCG Pocket Players Point Out Problem With Galaxy Background
item.description:
Summary

  • Pokemon TCG Pocket players criticize new Sparkling Sky backdrop
  • Players suggest transparent card features to fully appreciate backdrop design.
  • Wonder Pick event offers new backdrops and cosmetics, including Solgaleo-themed items.

Pokemon TCG Pocket players have pointed out a problem with one of the backdrops recently added to the game. Pokemon TCG Pocket recreates the physical Pokemon Trading Card Game experience, but with players collecting the popular cards in digital format, customizing their decks and the way they display the cards.

To do this, Pokemon TCG Pocket players obtain accessories that are used during matches or to display cards and collections for players. One of the community's favorite accessories are backdrops, which are illustrations used to create display boards and show off a player's favorite card. New backdrops can be obtained in different ways, such as events, by subscribing to the premium pass, or by buying a Poke Gold pack. A new backdrop is available in Pokemon TCG Pocket , but players found one design choice odd.

On the Pokemon TCG Pocket subreddit, user PtakPajak pointed out a problem with the new Sparkling Sky backdrop. For them, it didn't make sense for the devs to place an impressive illustration of the galaxy in the center of the accessory, causing it to disappear when the player inserts a card. To demonstrate their point, they shared two images: one is the empty backdrop, showing the full illustration, and the other is what it looks like after inserting a Dragonite card.

Pokemon TCG Pocket Offers Free Rewards in New Wonder Pick Event

The Sparkling Sky backdrop is one of the rewards in Part 1 of the new Wonder Pick event, which features other Solgaleo-themed cosmetics. In the comments section, one of the players suggested adding transparent card features, which could make it easier to see the full illustration. Another Redditor pointed out that the backdrop is probably illustrated this way because the event focused on Solgaleo, a Pokemon based on the sun. They also speculated that a backdrop with a night illustration could come when Part 2 of the event is released and Lunala-themed items are added. Some players have shared screenshots of cards placed on the backdrop, including the immersive Lillie card.

The first part of the Wonder Pick event is available from May 9-19. During it, players can get new Cosmog and Lycanroc promo cards with a Chansey stamp. Like other Pokemon TCG Pocket Wonder Pick events, the game will have bonus picks that don't cost stamina, and players can grab promo cards or items such as special tickets. These tickets can be exchanged in the event store for cosmetics other than the Sparkling Sky backdrop: a coin, playmat, card sleeve, a second backdrop, and a cover with an illustration of Solgaleo, a Lillie icon, and up to 50x Shinedust.

item.title: 7 Final Fantasy Games With the Best Weapon Customization, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Customization in Final Fantasy games varies from cosmetic upgrades to gameplay-altering changes.
  • Hard-to-unlock weapons are a staple in the series, requiring time and patience to acquire.
  • The materia system in Final Fantasy games allows for powerful weapon enhancements and combat strategies.

Final Fantasy games feature many weapons for players to choose from, but there are times when customization can be somewhat lacking in these titles. This is why fans cherish it when any game allows them to tinker with their weapons.

Customization options can range from cosmetic upgrades to meaningful changes that alter the way players approach combat. Either way, players will get a kick out of ensuring that their favorite party members boast the best weapons to obliterate any foe daring to strike them down.

7 Crisis Core: Final Fantasy 7 Reunion

Zack's Sword Can Be Imbued With Powerful Materia

Crisis Core: Final Fantasy 7 Reunion
9.0 /10
Released
December 13, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen due to Blood, Violence
Powered by

Crisis Core allows players to witness Zack Fair's history and the events that led to Cloud developing a trauma that he shrouded in ignorance for the longest time. The materia system was revolutionary in the Final Fantasy franchise, making it clear why this crystallized mako has wormed its way into so many Final Fantasy 7 games. Crisis Core is no exception. Zack Fair is an amazing character who can use materia to enhance his moves in combat. By the end of the title, players can acquire seriously powerful materia to make their enemies pay as the Buster Sword is custom-fitted to suit a certain playstyle.

6 Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth

More Powerful Weapons And Diverse Materia To Choose From

7 Images
7 Images
Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth
9 /10
36
9.3 /10
Released
February 29, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL
9 /10
36
9.3 /10

ESRB
T For Teen Due To Blood, Language, Mild Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco, Violence
Powered by

Given that the weapon system in Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth is almost identical to the one in Remake , it's easy to see why many of the customization mechanics persist too. Players can use various weapons in combat, improve them individually, and use materia to gain access to unique abilities. However, fans were miffed about certain changes. Weapons now automatically upgrade instead of offering players a choice, which ends up reducing the level of weapon customization in this title compared to Remake .

5 Stranger Of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin

Collect Smith's Hammers To Customize And Improve Weapons

6 Images
6 Images
Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin
Action RPG
Systems
Released
March 18, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL
7 /10

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Strong Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Powered by

Stranger of Paradise is one of the most underrated Final Fantasy spin-offs in the franchise, and more fans need to check it out. It may seem rather cringeworthy after seeing the previews, but one glance at the combat system is enough to change everyone's minds. It helps that this game allows for a decent degree of weapon customization, allowing players to acquire three Smith's Hammers. These can upgrade weapons' special effects, change them outright, or improve their affinities to certain jobs.

4 Final Fantasy 10

Customize Weapons' Auto-Abilities After Reaching Guadosalam

5 Images
5 Images
Final Fantasy 10
19
9.7 /10
Released
December 17, 2001

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen: Mild Blood, Mild Suggestive Themes, Violence
Powered by

It takes a while for players to unlock weapon customization in Final Fantasy 10 , but it's a worthwhile wait. Once Rikku joins the party in Guadosalam, players can decide which weapons get the auto-abilities they want to make combat easier.

While this makes for a fun degree of customization, it is hurt by the fact that the ultimate weapons of each party member don't benefit from this system. Still, that doesn't reduce the excitement for players who are willing to put in the grind for the game's best weapons and prefer to customize the ones they do find, however they like.

3 Final Fantasy 7 Remake

The Materia System Is As Great As Ever

Final Fantasy 7 Remake
8.3 /10
Released
April 10, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen due to Language, Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco, Violence
Powered by

Final Fantasy 7 Remake was bound to be a nostalgic trip, and the materia system would just be another part of the fun. Players loved the idea of acquiring these powerful crystals and applying them to their weapons to enhance their abilities.

Along with this, every weapon in the game featured an upgrade tree that could be developed to make these armaments more potent than ever. This ensured that combat in Final Fantasy 7 Remake never got old, allowing players to mix and match various weapons and their customizations to deal with the game's many threats.

2 Dirge Of Cerberus: Final Fantasy 7

The Game Has Its Issues, But Gun Customization Is Great

Dirge of Cerberus: Final Fantasy 7
Third-Person Shooter
Action RPG
Systems
Released
August 15, 2006
ESRB
Teen // Mild Language, Use of Tobacco, Violence
Developer(s)
Square Enix

Powered by

Final Fantasy 7: Dirge of Cerberus is far from the best Final Fantasy spinoff fans can enjoy. Still, for all its faults, the extensive weapon customization of this game should be lauded. Players will acquire a bunch of barrels, boosters, and accessories to pair up with their weapon. This allows every weapon to develop a personality of its own with the player's input, giving combat a personal touch that may just be enough for people to look past this title's faults.

1 Final Fantasy 7

The Revolutionary Materia System Is Still Paying Dividends

Final Fantasy 7
16
8.9 /10
Released
January 31, 1997

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen: Blood, Fantasy Violence, Language, Mild Suggestive Themes
Powered by

At the end of the day, there's only one game that deserves the greatest plaudits for combining Final Fantasy 's vast array of abilities with a system that encourages weapon and armor customization. The joy of obtaining different materia and watching it acquire new levels is a huge part of what makes Final Fantasy 7 so special.

Every weapon that players get throughout the game boasts either solo or paired materia slots, encouraging players to try and optimize their build. This system can get finicky when players have too many different materia to keep track of. Still, there's something about the incredible power held in these crystallized mako that turns the simple act of weapon customization into one of the core gameplay loops for Final Fantasy 7 .

item.title: Marvel Rivals: Giant-Size Hive Mind Event Schedule and Rewards
item.description:
Another new Marvel Rivals event is here in the form of Giant-Size Hive Mind, and this limited-time mode combines some of the most popular parts of previous Marvel Rivals events. Not to be confused with the Giant-Size Brain Blast event that just ended in Marvel Rivals , the Giant-Size Hive Mind event adds new twists to the big-headed formula.

Just like previous Marvel Rivals events, Giant-Size Hive Mind will only be available to play during two brief windows, so there's only a short amount of time to jump in. There aren't any limited rewards to grind for during the event period, though, so there's no need to abandon that competitive grind to participate in this goofy limited-time mode. Still, Giant-Size Hive Mind lets Marvel Rivals players get up to some silly shenanigans, so it's worth checking out for a while.

Marvel Rivals Giant-Size Hive Mind Schedule

The Giant-Size Hive Mind limited-time mode will only be live in Marvel Rivals on two weekends . The first weekend where Giant-Size Hive Mind will be available starts on May 9 and ends on May 12 . Then, the mode will disappear for a few days before returning for a second weekend from May 16 through May 19 . Outside of those short windows, the Giant-Size Hive Mind mode won't show up in the Marvel Rivals matchmaking menu.

While Giant-Size Hive Mind borrows the big-head player models from Giant-Size Brain Blast, it's a slightly different mode with some new modifications. In this limited-time mode, all players on the same team play as six copies of the same randomly-selected hero. It's basically Clone Rumble and Giant-Size Brain Blast combined into a single event.

Does Giant-Size Hive Mind Have Any Rewards?

Giant-Size Hive Mind does not appear to offer any unique rewards i n Marvel Rivals . Some challenges can be completed in the Giant-Size Hive Mind event playlist, but there are no event-specific challenges that require players to queue up specifically for the mode. The Brain Blast emotes are available for purchase for 400 Units in the store, though.

Even though Giant-Size Hive Mind can seem a bit underwhelming compared to previous Marvel Rivals events, there's still a lot of fun to be had in this limited-time mode. Plus, players can work on earning their free Hellfire Gala Wolverine skin in the process.

item.title: What Would a Gears of War Marcus Fenix Collection Look Like?
item.description:
Ever since 343 Industries and Xbox Game Studios released Halo: The Master Chief Collection in 2014, fans of Xboxâ€™s second most popular exclusive games franchise, Gears of War , have called for Xbox to release a similar compilation for the third-person shooter series. Based on Halo: MCC initially encompassing only games with Master Chief as the protagonist, Gears of War fans pitched their compilation game to be titled Gears of War: The Marcus Fenix Collection . While The Coalition has remade Gears of War 1 into 2015â€™s Gears of War: Ultimate Edition and the upcoming Gears of War: Reloaded , thereâ€™s still a lot of potential for a Marcus Fenix Collection to debut in the near future.

The History of Gears of War: The Marcus Fenix Collection Rumors

Gears of War: The Marcus Fenix Collection has never been officially announced or even given an official title. While fans began to speculate about the potential release of a remastered compilation of the Gears of War original trilogy, especially around Gears of War 2 and 3 â€™s 10th anniversaries in 2018 and 2021, The Coalition or Xbox have never made official remarks on a Gears of War compilation title. Instead, The Coalition continued moving forward in developing Gears of War sequels and spin-offs in the form of 2016â€™s Gears of War 4 , 2019â€™s Gears Pop! and Gears 5 , and 2020â€™s Gears Tactics .

However, in the five years since Gears Tactics â€™ debut, rumors of The Coalition developing a compilation of the original Gears of War trilogy began to appear frequently. In 2022, Xbox Era podcast host Nick Baker and The Verge's Tom Warren hinted that a Gears of War compilation would soon be released. Baker later affirmed in 2023 that more Gears remasters were in the works but didnâ€™t reveal his sources or further details. In early 2025, Head of Microsoft Gaming Phil Spencer began playing Gears of War 2 and 3 prompting many fans to speculate this was leading to announcements of the gamesâ€™ remasters. Spencer later explained that he was simply showing off the games to a friend who had never played Gears .

PlayStation 5 Gears of War: The Marcus Fenix Collection Rumors

In recent years, Microsoft has begun slowly porting over its most exclusive franchises to rival PlayStation platforms, such as Forza Horizon 5 being released on the PlayStation 5 in late April 2025. This trend was seemingly expected to continue when leakers and industry insiders extas1s and DetectiveSeeds suggested that a remastered collection of the original Gears of War trilogy would be announced at the June 2025 Xbox Games Showcase for both Xbox and PlayStation platforms. However, this rumored collection would reportedly not include any PVP multiplayer. Gears of War: The Marcus Fenix Collection could still possibly be announced at the upcoming showcase, but if their details are right, itâ€™s likely extas1s and DetectiveSeedsâ€™ information was about the recently announced Gears of War: Reloaded for PS5 instead.

The Coalition did briefly work on a remaster of Gears of War 2 around 2015, according to 3D models for the Riftwormâ€™s interior created by environmental artist Ayi Sanchez, but the project was canceled to focus more on multiplayer development.

How a Gears of War: The Marcus Fenix Collection Could Work

In light of the recent announcement and upcoming release of Gears of War: Reloaded in August for Xbox, PlayStation, and PC, a Marcus Fenix Collection may not release this year, if itâ€™s in development at all. With Gears of War: E-Day expected to be the next Gears game to release after Reloaded , likely in late 2025 or sometime in 2026, a Marcus Fenix Collection could possibly be released after E-Day . If both Reloaded and E-Day sell well on Xbox and PlayStation platforms, this could motivate Microsoft to greenlight The Coalition and possibly another developer to begin working on remastering Gears of War 2 and 3 for a compilation to catch PlayStation and PC players up in the series.

Using Halo: The Master Chief Collection as a reference, a Marcus Fenix Collection could feature both remastered campaigns and multiplayers of Gears of War 1 , 2 , and 3 , complete with all DLC and potentially new lore content akin to Halo â€™s terminals. Each gameâ€™s multiplayer progression could be updated and streamlined to unlock cosmetics for all three games and The Coalition could potentially release new character and weapon skins for multiplayer similar to Halo: MCC â€™s Fractures armor. If the Marcus Fenix Collection is released on Xbox, PlayStation, and PC, it could also feature seamless multiplayer crossplay between platforms, allowing for friends to easily play together no matter what system they own.

The Potential for a Marcus Fenix Collection to Include Sequels and Spin-Offs

While most rumors and fan pitches of a Marcus Fenix Collection have only included the original Gears of War trilogy, there is potential for The Coalition to include Gears of War: Judgment , Gears of War 4 , and Gears 5 in the compilation as well. Marcus Fenix does appear in those three games and all three are getting old enough to earn a slight remaster at least, with Judgment 12 years old, 4 being nine years old, and 5 being six years old. Including Judgment and the sequels in a Marcus Fenix Collection could help all players and Gears fans easily catch up on all major events in the series and help prepare everyone for the inevitable release of Gears of War 6 .
